title.rendered: Honda Cars India Ltd has associated with Smile Foundation

content.rendered:
Honda Cars India Ltd has associated with Smile Foundation

Honda Cars India Ltd has associated with Smile Foundation in January 2019 to provide quality intervention support to approximately 1200 children in 3 Government Schools in Greater Noida and Bhiwadi. The project focuses on scholastic and co-scholastic aspects of education. Under the project, behavioral aspects are also a important which involve health awareness, adolescent education, Life skills and Personality development workshop/sessions by experts and value education. Regular rewards and recognitions, PTAs, Community and Stakeholder Meetings are an integral part of the project.

HCIL is engaged in, inter alia, the business of the manufacture and sale of automobiles.
